main event: An observer in Sterling, Alaska reported a sighting of a pulsating object that appeared rounded in shape, visible for 45 seconds.
interesting points: The object was described as pulsating red, green, and white in color., The estimated diameter of the object was 25 to 30 feet., The sighting occurred on December 18, 1960, at 2115 hours., The object was observed for a total of 45 minutes, although it was mostly stationary., The conclusion mentioned in the report suggested it could be a meteor or meteorite.
witness description: Mrs. ______, 53, a resident of Sterling, Alaska.
